core.or.comment: Used in drag & drop OR Browse, where the drag&drop and Browse are image or buttons and not text
core.select-all.comment: It's a generic select all checkbox in a list component of different types
core.search.comment: It's a generic search box in a list component of different types
core.search-all-values.comment: Used in the grid's filter list search box
core.invalid-file-size: File is too large. Maximum file size is {{size}}
core.invalid-file-size.comment: Error message when uploaded file is too large
core.week-days.comment: There is a 2 character design for the week days names
core.try-to-adjust-or.comment: This is a part of a sentence and a call to action link " try to adjust or to clear filters" where the clear filters is an action so we can't combine into a single sentence
core.no-items-to-display: There are no items to display
core.try-to-refresh-or-contact: Try to refresh or contact support

how-to-post-description: Just click on the orange button in the right corner to post your items sitting around your house for people in your community to rent! Not only does this help people in your community and helps the environment as well because it gives people the option to rent instead of buy. Every item rented is spared from being bought and ultimately ending up in a landfill.
how-to-post-description-title-3:
Enjoy saving money, space
and the planet
how-to-post-description-1: having a family reunion and need a BBQ or projector? are you going camping and need a tent? search the Ruckify Marketplace and find what you need!
how-to-post-description-2: People in your community might be in great need of specific rental items or simply wish to try a new activity!
how-to-post-description-3: pick up, have it delivered or arrive at your rented space and enjoy the fact you not only saved money and space, but you helped the environment by renting, not buying.
how-to-rent-description-title-1: Find items you want to rent
how-to-rent-description-title-2: Select the dates and times you want it
how-to-rent-description-title-3:
Enjoy saving money, space
and the planet
how-to-rent-description-1: having a family reunion and need a BBQ or projector? are you going camping and need a tent? search the Ruckify Marketplace and find what you need!
how-to-rent-description-2: book your item or space for the dates and times you need. view all the details about what you want to rent and ask the poster any questions you have.
how-to-rent-description-3: pick up, have it delivered or arrive at your rented space and enjoy the fact you not only saved money and space, but you helped the environment by renting, not buying.
what-are-rewards-description: In order to gain your first rewards all you have to do is to sign up to YardRent. To gain more rewards at YardRent:
what-are-rewards-description-bullet1: Share your home products for letting others rent them which will grant you rewards
what-are-rewards-description-bullet2: Leave your feedback so others could enjoy
home-search.what-would-you-like-to-rent: what would you like to rent?
home-search.help: Just type what you need and will search our marketplace for it!

delete-users-dialog.title: Delete users
delete-users-dialog.content-1: You are about to delete the following users:
delete-users-dialog.content-2:
All the products that were posted by these users will also be deleted.
Are you sure you want to proceed?

click-to-upload-profile: Click to upload a profile image
homepage-recycle-description: Recycle to insure a another day on Earth. Scroll down to see a short video that demonstrates our thoughts.
homepage-share-description: People in your community might be in great need of specific rental items or simply wish to try a new activity!
homepage-rewards-description: Instead of items sitting idle 80% of the time, you can put them to work and earn rewards instead.

item-page.no-match: We can't seem to find this product

session-expired: Your session has expired, please re-login
something-went-wrong: Something went wrong, please contact the support team
about-description: YardRent is the largest online peer-to-peer borrow marketplace, empowering its members to embrace the sharing economy and leave unnecessary purchases behind. Designed with both people and businesses in mind, anyone can post their items and spaces on YardRent for people in their community to rent. YardRent is dedicated to changing the world and curtailing the spread of unsustainable consumerism. The platform has also launched TreeProject, a commitment from YardRent to plant a tree for every transaction made on the app, allowing anyone to be a part of the mission towards a greener, healthier earth 🌍.
contact-us-description: Feel free to contact us for any kind of question
logout-clear-cart:
You have {{count}} items in your cart, if you proceed with the logout your cart will be cleard.
Are you sure you want to proceed?
empty-cart: Your cart is empty! fill it up with goods from our

order-completed.title: Order {{id}} has been placed
order-completed.subtitle: Enjoy your items! keep on making the world greener 🌱
order-completed.twitter-title: Hold on! want to make 100 shiny new rewards?
order-completed.twitter-instructions: All you have to do is allow us to post your order* on our twitter channel!
order-completed.twitter-disclaimer: *Only your name and the amount of items you rented will be posted

order-failure.title: Something went wrong
order-failure.status:
The items listed above were removed from your shopping cart.

If you wish to rent the remaining items re-click the "Place order" button.

delete-items.title: Delete items
delete-items.content: You are about to remove this item from the marketplace, are you sure?
delete-items.content-plural: You are about to remove these items from the marketplace, are you sure?
